section.title: World Server Configuration
section.para: These settings apply to only the world server configuration.

section.title: ID
section.para: ID of the world when registering it with the lobby. Should start at 0 and increment for each new world. Must be in the range (0, 255).

section.title: Name
section.para: Name of the world (shown in lobby).

section.title: LobbyIP
section.para: IP address of the lobby server to connect to. This defaults to 127.0.0.1 (localhost).

section.title: LobbyPort
section.para: Port of the lobby server to connect to. This defaults to 10666.

section.title: ChannelConnectionTimeOut
section.para: Number of seconds until a new channel connection expires. If the user does not log into the channel before this expires they have to start the login process over again.

section.title: WorldSharedConfig
section.para: Sub-section for all world shared config settings. For more information see the dedicated documentation section.
